name: national-capital
description: National Capital has multiple platforms active in different fields of businesses, which varies from project development, to investment, business solutions services and trading. Building on years of active participation and successful execution of numerous projects, combined with a vast network and deep influence in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, National Capital has positioned itself as a one of the key players capable of tapping into the large and rapidly growing Saudi market both as developer, investor and service provider.

scripts.import-sample-data: cd studio && sanity dataset import sample-data.tar.gz --replace
